content.title: The Game Awards 2018 announcements: Dragon Age 4 and Far Cry: New Dawn headline new game reveals - The Telegraph
content.desc: BioWare has announced that RPG Dragon Age 4 is coming at The Game Awards ceremony. The long-awaited fantasy RPG is reportedly still early in development, but BioWare has teased its fans with a short video and the phrase The Dread Wolf Rises; a reference to elven apostate Solas. Far Cry: New Dawn, a direct post-apocalyptic sequel to Ubisoft's open-world shooter Far Cry 5, was unveiled for 15 February 2019. The game is set 17 years after Far Cry 5, with a 'super-bloom' transforming the setting of Hope County into a vivid, colourful post-nuclear land. And staying with pink post-apocalyptia, Ra...
